name: top-applications

time_period.description: Time period to retrieve data for [hour | day | week].

GET.summary:
Retrieve top FortiView applications traffic stats by bandwidth.
Access Group: ftviewgrp

help: Retrieve top FortiView applications traffic stats by bandwidth.

last_rx.name: last_rx
last_rx.title: Last Recorded Downstream Bandwidth
last_rx.description: Application's last recorded downstream bandwidth for the selected time frame, in bits per second.

last_tx.name: last_tx
last_tx.title: Last Recorded Upstream Bandwidth
last_tx.description: Application's last recorded upstream bandwidth for the selected time frame, in bits per second.

rx.name: rx
rx.title: Recorded Downstream Bandwidth
rx.description: Array of application's recorded downstream bandwidth within the selected time frame.

tx.name: tx
tx.title: Recorded Upstream Bandwidth
tx.description: Array of application's recorded upstream bandwidth within the selected time frame.

total_bytes.name: total_bytes
total_bytes.title: Total Bytes
total_bytes.description: Total accumulated traffic generated by the application since it was first recorded, in bytes.

response_description: Bandwidth history of top and monitored FortiView applications within the selected time frame.

time_period.name: time_period
time_period.summary: Time period to retrieve data for [hour | day | week].
